001package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.builders.crypto;
002
003import org.slf4j.Logger;
004import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
005import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.shared.L;
006import java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException;
007import java.security.SecureRandom;
008import java.security.SecureRandomSpi;
009import java.util.Arrays;
010
011public class AllZeroSecureRandom extends SecureRandom {
012    private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(AllZeroSecureRandom.class);
013
014    private static class CustomSpi extends SecureRandomSpi {
015        CustomSpi() {
016            log.error("INSECURE RANDOM SEED IS BEING USED. THIS IS NOT CRYPTOGRAPHICALLY SECURE, USE AT YOUR OWN RISK!");
017        }
018
019        @Override
020        protected void engineSetSeed(byte[] seed) {
021        }
022
023        @Override
024        protected void engineNextBytes(byte[] bytes) {
025            Arrays.fill(bytes, (byte) 0);
026        }
027
028        @Override
029        protected byte[] engineGenerateSeed(int numBytes) {
030            return null;
031        }
032
033    }
034
035    public AllZeroSecureRandom()
036    {
037        super(createSPI(), null);
038    }
039
040    static SecureRandomSpi createSPI()
041    {
042        return new CustomSpi();
043    }
044
045    public static void main(String... args) {
046        AllZeroSecureRandom secRnd = new AllZeroSecureRandom();
047
048        byte[] rndBytes = new byte[17];
049        secRnd.nextBytes(rndBytes);
050
051        for (byte r : rndBytes)
052        {
053            System.out.print(String.format("%02x ", r & 0xFF));
054        }
055        System.out.println();
056    }
057
058    private static final long serialVersionUID = -7550189683373026294L;
059
060}
